descriptionHTML:
Embark on the journey of self-improvement towards better qualities of love, life and health. Record your daily events, secret, gratitude, and relive those moments in Journey. Trusted by millions of users, Journey is your perfect journaling companion that keeps your private memories for a lifetime.


Future-proof digital journal
Designed to keep journal last forever, Journey gives you full control of your private diary by storing them in Google Drive sync.


Bring your memories anywhere
Sync journal across multiple platforms. Write on-the-go with Android and iOS, or settle down comfortably at home and type on Chromebook, Mac and Windows devices.


Grow your journaling habit
Journey's simple and beautiful diary interface encourages you to write more.


Effortless journaling
Keeping a diary is easy with Journey; add photos or video and pen your thoughts. It does the rest by adding weather and places to journal entry automatically.


Relive moments beautifully
View your journal in timeline, revisit places shown in map, travel back to the past with calendar and review what you did last year with Throwback.


Private diary with PIN
Keep secret diary with PIN - enable password and fingerprint locking.


Versatile journaling
From fitness to gratitude, customize journal to suit your preferences by connecting to Google Fit and inspiration prompt.


Share moments with friends and family
Update your loved ones by publishing journal entry to social media.


Import and export journal into various formats
Import entries from Diaro, Evernote and DayOne. You can also export diary to Word docx and print to PDF.


Please note that you'll need to upgrade to premium version to enjoy all features in the app.


Also available for
iOS: https://goo.gl/yEee4d
ChromeOS: http://goo.gl/yLUKg2
Web: https://www.journey.cloud
PC: http://goo.gl/5Z0nZt
Macintosh: http://goo.gl/KH6PgN


Permissions Required
- ACCESS_FINE_LOCATION: Determine precise location to retrieve places and weather
- READ_EXTERNAL_STORAGE: Import diary entry
- WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE: Export and share journal entry
comments: So far, it's awesome, I'm loving it. The only reason why I'm not giving it a 5 is because the last journal app I downloaded only gave me a trial period. So I'm hanging out for this atm to see if it stops me from writing. But so far, I'm enjoying it more than the last one which is what I was hoping for. Please don't kick me out! I need this journaling app or my life will be in chaos!!

Looks interesting,  but it needs a bit of flexibility.  It seems so tied to Google services,  that I thought it was made by Google. I use OneDrive and would like to see backup and sync options,  using that.  Others use DropBox, which is also missing. For Fitness,  I use Samsung Health and also MyFitnessPal,  not Google Fit,  which is the only fitness service supported.    Straight away,  I was put off because I am not going to change multiple services to try this one.

I absolutely love it but it would be great if we can add videos from our gallery or something like tag it.   That's one improvement I won't mind paying for. :)  Hope this is constructive feedback. Thanks !

Please add option to turn off the auto detection of your current activity. It is always wrong and I hate having to manually change it. Would prefer to have it show no activity unless you want to add it. I don't like being forced to use a feature I don't want. Otherwise 5 stars. I paid for the premium and I like it.

It is almost perfect. It will however be complete if there is title and categories included. Also one cannot search using the tags. That way, it will not provide easy access to one's entries. Please rectify this. Thank you.
So far so good.  Does what it claims to do, haven't had any issues so far.
recentChanges: - Add up to 10 photos per entry (Premium only)
- Skip Sign in to Google Drive
- Sync using cellular network bug fixed
